mapper.select: SELECT OpportunityID, CustomerID, CustomerName, CustomerMobile, FollwUpWay, CustomerTag, dbo.F_FormatDate(TheLatestFollowUpDate) TheLatestFollowUpDate, TheLatestFollowUpContent, dbo.F_GetDictionaryName(IntentionLevel) IntentionLevel, IsCare, OpportunityStatus, OpportunityStatusValue, IsCustomerFirstEdit,SaleUserName FROM V_CustomerGWList_Select WHERE SaleUserID = '{UserID}' AND ProjectID = '{ProjectID}' {WHERE} {ORDER}
